forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 18C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun. Slight chance of a rain shower. High near 65F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this evening followed by increasing clouds with showers developing after midnight. Low 14C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this evening followed by increasing clouds with showers developing after midnight. Low 57F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High around 15C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High near 60F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 13C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low around 55F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 16C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 61F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High near 15C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain in the afternoon. High near 60F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two around the area in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Chance of a shower or two during the morning, followed by partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High around 60F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.
